DOC.brief_summary: The aim of the present study is to investigate the impact of regular aerobic exercise on psychopathology, cortisol secretion, BDNF, sleep, cognitive performance, and psychological functioning in people suffering from professional burnout. Pre- and postassessments after 12 weeks of training will be performed.
DOC.brief_title: Effects of Aerobic Exercise on Occupational Burnout
DOC.criteria: burnout male participants nonsmokers psychiatric disorders smokers physical diseases
